column5: great news!!!  all the best to sue and yourself!!!  cheers!
Great news! So glad to hear this Cliff and just in time for Christmas too.   All the best wishes for a happy holiday and an early happy healthy new year.
Great to hear, you two have yourselves a great Christmas!

First I want to apologize, I haven't been around very much for a bit now and while many of you have sent emails, called, and sent PMs. I've tried to respond to all but with going to school, working, and Dr.s appointments I'm sure I've missed a few.  The good news is that the Dr.s have changed a few of Sue's medications around, they can't repair the damage to her heart but they have her back to feeling almost her oldself again. She is off the nitro patch and has only had to use the spray occasionally in the last few weeks. She has actually started going back to work for 3 hour shifts once or twice a week because she finds it takes her mind off things.  She'll have to be careful and take things easy but I'd rather have that than the alternitive!  So thanks for all your prayers and well wishes, perhaps now I can get back to being a contributing member of this board again.
Awesome news Cliff!
Good to here

Good stuff. This arrived in an email today and it just seems appropriate to the moment. I never keep these but this one was just so perfectly compact that I saved it. Now i know why.  Heavenly Father, please bless all my friends in whatever it is that You know they may be needing this day! And may their life be full of Your peace, prosperity and power as he/she seeks to have a closer relationship with You. Amen.  JF
Thanks for the update Cliff.  Take it easy Sue, don't do anything too crazy and enjoy the pampering.
Good to hear Cliff.
good news for sure
Glad to hear things are looking better Cliff.  Debbe & I are always thinking good thoughts for the both of you. Well the 3 of you...Andy gets some well wishing too!  Regards, Steve
Thats Great news!!
That is great news Cliff! I couldn't think of a better Christmas present for you.  GOD Bless  Cheers, Ron...
Glad to hear that Sue is improving. Take good care of yourselves. Quality people are few and far between in this world.

What are you apologizing for Cliff ! Family comes first.. and I mean your real one. Us, we'll I sure hope so anyhow, all understand that!  Glad to hear things are on the up and up and that Sue's adjusting to the cards she was, unfortunately, dealt and trying to get back to a normal routine.
Very happy to hear that Cliff. Take good care of her, she deserves it.  S.
Great news Cliff! We will be in touch..  John & Barbara

Thanks for posting the great news, Cliff. I'll be hitting the Kawarthas this summer Cliff. I'll need a hug from my good luck charm. No Cliff, it's not you. You hug that great woman of yours...I know that you're both so thankful to have each other.
Super news Cliff.

Hallelujah !!! Best news I've heard in a while...  Maribeth will be pleased to hear this also...  I will try to remember to say thanks when I put these aching and weary bones to bed...  I thought I retired from "work" but this snow removal stuff is just like work...
Glad to hear Sue is doing better.   Art

I must have missed something Cliff as this is all news to me.  But I am very glad to hear she's doing better and would like to extend best wishes from myself and the family this holiday season!  Cheers, Ryan
Wonderful news Cliff.  I've missed  you around here.  Give Sue a big hug for me please  Joey
Great to hear this update Cliff!! All the best to you and Sue...and of course Andy too!
G'dammit,,,,,,nearly missed this one. Great news Cliff. hope that good Lady gets well enough  to keep you in line.  How about your test you had done ??
Great news Cliff ... Merry Christmas !
Big Cliff: Your gratitude is infectious.. .especially at this time of the year.  God Bless  Splashhopper and Botbot
Stupendous news Cliff, I'm gald to hear of it.
